About Me

Cinematography • Colour grading • Software development

Hi! I'm a freelancer based in Edinburgh, working throughout Scotland and the UK. Working primarily in the camera department, I have experience as a camera trainee and 2nd AC on high-end industry projects and regularly work as Director of Photography and Colourist on short films and commercials.

Since 2019, I have been building and improving my filmmaking skillset, and have been involved in many different types of projects, including short films, web series, music videos, or corporate videos. Currently, I also work as a lighting camera operator at MBP, an award-winning Scottish production company.

With a focus on cinematography and colour grading, I am also a proficient video editor, graphic designer, VFX artist, and even software developer. This perhaps reveals what I enjoy most about content creation: mastering a wide array of technical skills to best articulate a creative idea.

Get in touch

If you would like to get in touch to discuss my work or a potential collaboration, please reach out to me at contact@piersdeseilligny.com
